abstract.original_text: A 57-year-old woman from Wuhan, China visited our hospital with a 5-day history of fever and dry cough. On the day of her visit, she presented with slight chest tightness, chills, and muscle soreness of the lower limbs.

sentences.segment_text: China visited our hospital with a 5-day history of fever and dry cough .
On the day of her visit ,
she presented with slight chest tightness ,
chills , and muscle soreness of the lower limbs .
